tit.cmt: カッコ部分を補いました。

sen.j: 令制（りょうせい）とは、律令のうち行政法にあたる令に基づく諸制度をいう。
sen.e: Ryosei is the systems based on ryo that was equivalent to the administrative law of the Ritsuryo codes.
Ryosei is the systems based on ryo that refer to the administrative law of the Ritsuryo codes.
sen.cmt: was equivalent→refer と修正しました。
sen.e: Ryosei is the systems based on ryo that refer to the administrative law of the Ritsuryo codes.

sen.j: 日本では8世紀に制定・施行された大宝律令、養老律令に基づく諸制度が令制とされた。
sen.e: In Japan the systems based on Taiho Code and Yoro Ritsuryo Code, which were enacted and enforced in the 8th century, were regarded as Ryosei.
In Japan, the systems based on Taiho Code and Yoro Ritsuryo Code, which were enacted and enforced in the eighth century, were regarded as Ryosei.
In Japan, the systems based on Taiho Code and Yoro Ritsuryo Code, which were enacted and enforced in the eighth century, were regarded as Ryosei.

sen.j: 例えば、律令に定める官職、地方行政単位である国（令制国）、文書の書式などが挙げられる。
sen.e: For example, this contains a government post in the Ritsuryo codes, a province as a unit of local administration (ryoseikoku), a format of documents and so on.
For example, those government posts in the Ritsuryo codes, provinces as a unit of local administration (ryoseikoku), the format of documents and so on are mentioned.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: For example, those government posts in the Ritsuryo codes, provinces as a unit of local administration (ryoseikoku), the format of documents and so on are mentioned.
Refer to the article on the ritsuryo system for further information.
Refer to the article on the ritsuryo system for further information.
Refer to the article on the ritsuryo system for further information.
